How to Buy $ANGELTOKEN ?

Create a Wallet

Create a WalletOn Google Chrome, visit metamask.io to download the extension and set up a wallet. Android and iOS users can download the Trust Wallet app on your phone.

Send $BNB to your BSC wallet

Buy $BNB from Binance Exchange and transfer to your BSC wallet address.

Swap $BNB for $ANGELTOKEN

Go to the DApps tab at the bottom, find Angel Token, click âSelect a Currencyâ, enter the contract address in the search bar, and you should be able to find Angel Token.

Angel Token Contract Address: 0x02ff5065692783374947393723dba9599e59f59

Before the Swap, click the gear and set the slippage to 12-15%, set the amount you want to buy and click the âSwapâ button.

If you are operating on the PC, please enter the Angel Token official website and click âConnect Walletâ at the top right of the website.


Angel Token: https://angeltoken.com
